```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(pictoralist)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Load the source code for the figure of card A
card_env_A <- new.env()
source(file='fig_comp_line.R', local=card_env_A)

# Load the source code for the figure of card B
card_env_B <- new.env()
source(file='fig_single_bar.R', local=card_env_B)

# Load data and define recipient
data <- pictoralist::read_data('synth_data.csv')
recipient <- 'p2'
```

<!-- CARD 1A -->
**Card 1A**
\  

Dear Dr. Anesthetic,

You have become a top performer this month for the measure [postoperative nausea and vomiting](https://mpog.org/files/quality/measures/ponv-03_spec.pdf) (PONV 03):

```{r figureA, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='hide', fig.width=5, fig.height=3, fig.showtext=TRUE}
  # Run figure generation
  card_env_A$run(recipient, data, list())
```

\  

A case-by-case breakdown of your results are available at your [clinical quality dashboard](https://www.aspirecqi.org/HIEBus/identityserver/local/login?signInId=2b0fc382a1904b699377c926723c9eb4).

More information about the rationale for the measure PONV 03 and how it is calculated [are available here](https://spec.mpog.org/Spec/Public/33).
